text: If there's specific resistance to women making movies, I just choose to ignore that as an obstacle for two reasons: I can't change my gender, and I refuse to stop making movies.
author: Kathryn Bigelow

text: Everyone related to me in my circle was from church: church friends, church school, church activities. All my friends weren't allowed to watch MTV or go to PG-13 movies or listen to the radio, so I didn't really know anything different. That's how I was raised.
author: Katy Perry

text: My whole life has been movies and religion. That's it. Nothing else.
author: Martin Scorsese

text: Very often I've known people who wouldn't say a word to each other, but they'd go to see movies together and experience life that way.
author: Martin Scorsese

text: I've seen many, many movies over the years, and there are only a few that suddenly inspire you so much that you want to continue to make films.
author: Martin Scorsese
